title: Is MS Chouhan enough for the JEE Advanced exam? - Quora

response.answer_text: For solving problems of organic chemistry it's good , you can also refer to Himanshu Pandey by GRB and for theory part I will suggest you go with Solomon and Fryhle by Wiley Publications..  This two books are sufficient for JEE Organic Chemistry….
I think solomons and fryhle is not sufficient as no of questions are quite less….u can read some topics from it like optical inversions (spectro part basically)…and some more
